Opportunities

Short-term internships, scholarships, competitions, and opportunities for MEMS students

Google

Winter Internship

Corporate
Dec 2024 - Jan 2025
Stipend: $8000/month
CPI: 8.5+

Description

6-week winter internship in Google's engineering team. Work on real projects and gain industry experience.

Requirements

  • • Strong programming skills
  • • Data structures & algorithms
  • • Good academic record
  • • Available during winter break

Deadline

October 15, 2024

Student Reviews

R
Rahul Kumar (3rd Year)

"Amazing experience! The interview process was challenging but fair. Great mentorship and real project exposure. Highly recommend!"

P
Priya Sharma (4th Year)

"Excellent learning opportunity. The team was supportive and I learned a lot about large-scale systems."

Microsoft Research

Fellowship Program

Scholarship
Summer 2025
Amount: $15,000
CPI: 9.0+

Description

Research fellowship for outstanding students. Work on cutting-edge research projects at Microsoft Research.

Requirements

  • • Excellent academic record
  • • Research experience
  • • Strong recommendations
  • • Research proposal

Deadline

December 1, 2024

Student Reviews

A
Amit Patel (4th Year)

"Incredible research experience! The fellowship provided excellent resources and mentorship. Great for PhD preparation."

N
Neha Singh (4th Year)

"The application process was rigorous but worth it. Research environment was world-class and very collaborative."

TechFest Hackathon

Innovation Challenge

Competition
Nov 15-17, 2024
Prize: ₹50,000
Team Size: 2-4

Description

48-hour hackathon focused on sustainable technology solutions. Build innovative projects and win prizes.

Themes

  • • Sustainable Energy
  • • Smart Manufacturing
  • • Healthcare Technology
  • • Environmental Solutions

Deadline

November 10, 2024

Student Reviews

K
Karan Malhotra (3rd Year)

"Intense 48 hours but incredibly rewarding! Great networking opportunity and learned a lot about sustainable tech."

S
Sanya Verma (2nd Year)

"Amazing experience! Met brilliant minds and built something meaningful. The mentorship was top-notch."

CAD Workshop

SolidWorks Training

Workshop
Dec 20-22, 2024
Fee: ₹500
Capacity: 30 students

Description

3-day intensive workshop on SolidWorks CAD software. Learn 3D modeling, assembly design, and simulation.

What You'll Learn

  • • 3D part modeling
  • • Assembly design
  • • Engineering drawings
  • • Simulation basics

Deadline

December 15, 2024

Student Reviews

V
Vikram Singh (3rd Year)

"Excellent workshop! The hands-on practice with SolidWorks was very helpful. Great for mechanical design careers."

A
Arnav Gupta (2nd Year)

"Very practical workshop. Learned 3D modeling skills that are essential for mechanical engineering projects."

Merit Scholarship

Academic Excellence

Scholarship
Academic Year 2025
Amount: ₹50,000
CPI: 9.0+

Description

Merit-based scholarship for students with outstanding academic performance and research potential.

Requirements

  • • CPI 9.0 or above
  • • Research experience
  • • Strong recommendations
  • • Statement of purpose

Deadline

January 15, 2025

Student Reviews

M
Meera Patel (4th Year)

"The scholarship process was transparent and fair. Great recognition for academic excellence and research work."

S
Siddharth Kumar (3rd Year)

"Excellent opportunity for students with strong academic records. The application process was straightforward."

Startup Internship

Product Development

Corporate
Jan 6-10, 2025
Stipend: ₹2000/day
CPI: 7.5+

Description

5-day intensive internship at a tech startup. Work on real product development and gain hands-on experience.

Requirements

  • • Basic programming skills
  • • Good communication
  • • Available during break
  • • Enthusiasm to learn

Deadline

December 20, 2024

Student Reviews

A
Anjali Desai (3rd Year)

"Great exposure to startup culture! Fast-paced environment with lots of learning opportunities. Perfect for entrepreneurship."

P
Pranav Desai (2nd Year)

"Short but impactful internship. Learned about product development and got hands-on experience with real projects."

MIT Research Internship

Mechanical Engineering

University
Summer 2025
Stipend: $3000/month
CPI: 8.8+

Description

10-week research internship at MIT's mechanical engineering department. Work on cutting-edge research projects.

Requirements

  • • Strong academic background
  • • Research experience preferred
  • • GRE scores (optional)
  • • Research proposal

Deadline

December 1, 2024

Student Reviews

K

Stanford University

Robotics Research

University
Summer 2025
Stipend: $3500/month
CPI: 9.0+

Description

Research internship in Stanford's robotics lab. Work on autonomous systems and machine learning applications.

Requirements

  • • Excellent academic record
  • • Programming skills (Python, C++)
  • • Robotics/ML background
  • • Strong recommendations

Deadline

November 15, 2024

TU Munich Exchange

Semester Exchange Program

Exchange
Fall 2025
Duration: 6 months
CPI: 8.0+

Description

Semester exchange program at Technical University of Munich. Study mechanical engineering courses in German university.

Requirements

  • • Good academic standing
  • • German language proficiency (B1)
  • • Valid passport
  • • Health insurance

Deadline

March 1, 2025

Student Reviews

M
Meera Patel (4th Year)

"Amazing cultural experience in Germany! The engineering education is very practical and industry-focused."

V
Vikram Singh (3rd Year)

"Great opportunity to experience European education system. German language skills are essential but very rewarding."

NUS Exchange

Semester Exchange Program

Exchange
Spring 2025
Duration: 6 months
CPI: 7.5+

Description

Semester exchange at National University of Singapore. Experience Asian education system and culture.

Requirements

  • • Good academic standing
  • • English proficiency
  • • Valid passport
  • • Cultural adaptability

Deadline

October 1, 2024

Student Reviews

A
Arnav Gupta (3rd Year)

"Excellent experience in Singapore! The education system is very similar to IIT but with international exposure."

K
